sub_title: Learning And Development Specialist at DAF Trucks NV
summary:
Electronic engineer, M.Sc. from Venezuela,
Now an Ingenieur i.r. in the Netherlands.

My technical experience is very eclectic and involves control and instrumentation, mathematical modeling, electrical generation, simulation, teaching, and now I work as a L&D specialist in the automotive industry.

In summary "Doing my best wherever I go''

projects.title: SimSCR development - Desarrollo de simulador de operaciones para sistema de conduccion de relaves.
projects.description:
Sim-SCR v1.1, es una aplicación que permite simular la respuesta de operación hidráulica para la el sistema de conducción de relaves de las líneas 16” y 18” que constituyen la ruta de conducción hacia el embalse Los Leones.  

Sim-SCR v1.1 ha sido programado en lenguaje C, en la plataforma de desarrollo Matlab de la empresa Mathworks, versión 2017a, dicho simulador, está basado en la Ecuación de Bernoulli para líquidos en régimen estacionario en orden de obtener el Perfil hidráulico del proceso del SCR.
  
En consideración a las Pérdidas de energía mecánica en conducciones cilíndricas se considera el factor de fricción de Moody en función del número de Reynolds y la rugosidad de las conducciones. 

El simulador tiene como objeto presentar el comportamiento estimado del SCR en diferentes casos de operación, los cuales serán indicados por el usuario en las ventanas de diálogo y tomados como entrada al proceso de cálculo computacional. 

Principalmente, el simulador presentará como salidas principales:  Perfil piezométrico de la línea a operar  BOP de la línea  Presiones admisibles normales  Presiones admisibles eventuales  Potencial  Puntos de ruptura  Válvulas habilitadas de sala de válvulas.  También presenta un resumen de operaciones de acuerdo a los datos de entrada configurados por usuario y las caídas de presión calculadas por cada estación disipadora. 

Sim-SCR v1 es una aplicación ejecutable y portable, no requiere instalación previa de ningún otro paquete para su funcionamiento.

profile_positions.description:
CORPOELEC is the main power supplier in Venezuela and comprises different types of power generation, which the main one is hydro electrical.

As Control engineer, I used to be assigned to the Hydroelectric Power Plant Manuel Piar in the
Instrumentation and Control department.

The responsibilities consisted of:
Maintenance concepts development, failure prevention analysis, failure analysis, and performing system
modifications accordingly.
To assess reports and notifications on the installation status.
To prepare reports on findings and advise on actions to take.
To develop and evaluate measurement programs and setups and their results.
Review standards/procedures/regulations on maintenance and create proposals if necessary.
To provide advice on the purchase of spare parts.
profile_positions.title: Control Engineer

company.name: Universidad Nacional Experimental Politécnica 'Antonio José de Sucre'

profile_positions.company: Universidad Nacional Experimental Politécnica 'Antonio José de Sucre'​
profile_positions.description:
UNEXPO (www.poz.unexpo.edu.ve/web/) Is a public institution of higher education located in Venezuela. UNEXPO is an institution oriented towards the realization of teaching, research and extension activities. 
 
It is structured in Vice-Rectorships located in the cities of Barquisimeto, Ciudad Guayana, and Caracas. The seat of the Rector's Office is located in the city of Barquisimeto. It also has offices in Carora, Guarenas, and Charallave. 
 
As a lecturer, the subjects in charge were: 
 
For undergraduate program: 
Basics: Physics I, Physics I laboratory, and Physics II laboratory. 
For the specialty of Electronic Engineering: Numerical Analysis, Computer Science I. 
 
 For postgraduate program: 
Diploma in Energy Efficiency program: Electrical Machines, Energy Management Systems. 
Master in Electronic Engineering program: Renewable energy systems.
profile_positions.title: Lecturer

profile_positions.description:
TSK (http://www.grupotsk.com/) is an industrial engineering and construction company
focused on engineering, development, and supply of facilities for the energy, industry, mineral handling, and environment sectors. The company is headquartered in Gijón, Spain, and was created in 1986. 

As Project Engineer, the responsibilities were oriented towards the complete fulfillment of the contract with the client (CORPOELEC) according to the quality standards.

Projects assigned until then:
Tocoma distribution yard construction 400kV.
Modernization of Guayana B substation 400kV / 115kV.
Protections line replacement for line 2 in Guri B distribution yard 400kV.

Activities:
Configure customer-specific electrical technical order documentation, based on the sales configuration
and the standard diagrams
Initiating corrective actions if necessary
Receive and monitor the General Field Report
to enforce and follow up on Corrective Action Requests
had budget plans for field actions until the necessary approval
to provide coordination regarding the required stock of parts
to record field actions in systems
to provide timely reports to management on the progress of field actions
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer

profile_positions.description:
AB Proyectos e inspecciones (http://www.abprocol.com/) It is a company that provides consulting services and development of EPC projects, conceptual, basic, and detailed engineering, inspection, and auditing, based on processes, procedures, and technical standards specific to the energy sector.

In Venezuela, I worked as a Project Engineer in the Instrumentation Department, assigned to projects for the oil sector, of which the principal client was PDVSA Gas, all projects were developed in the Cryogenic Complex of Jose located at the Anzoátegui State. The activities performed were:

Configure customer-specific electrical technical order documentation, based on the sales configuration
and the standard machine diagrams, for new machines, automation projects, and modifications of existing machines
Design order specific customizations
Making cost calculations (materials and hours) for the offer process
Maintain and update the standard electro-technical drawings
Participate in Technical Lifecycle Management (R&D) activities
Provide technical support to other departments (e.g.: troubleshooting, working on new concepts, finding
replacements parts for obsolete items)
Make sure that all our designs match and respect machine safety regulations, manufacturability,
availability of parts, etc.

This experience allowed me to improve my capacity for organization and speed of response by combining field and office activities associated with my discipline.
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer (Control and Instrumentation Department)
